Articles.Content:
Or they do until the Mods remember that they were suppose to be turned off.

We remember and they'll be turned off in due time. - Ted
That's good. I wonder if attachments work properly now, too, instead of messing up the page they're on?

We remember and they'll be turned off in due time.

THANK you for planning to turn that BS back off!

Welcome to the forums again!

I had a glimpse at the old spoilers, but they disappeared a minute later.

If they're still a security threat then "in good time" would be now.

Otherwise I BEG you to leave them on because JEEBUS do we need them to be working.
Aw, that's a shame. I hope the exploit that caused them to be turned off in the first place gets fixed.
Frankly, I've never understood why people want pictures that can't be seen... The forum's mobile browser mode doesn't even let you open them.

Frankly, I've never understood why people want pictures that can't be seen... The forum's mobile browser mode doesn't even let you open them.

I think it's for the really picture heavy threads, and so that people can post a lot without murdering a thread - I'm reluctant about opening known image heavy threads just because I'm impatient and my interwebz is garbage

This will be cool. We can avoid ruining stuff for those who haven't seen it yet! And avoid seeing things we want to discover for ourselves!

...No, I'm not the secret identity of Captain Obvious... why do you ask?
It would only "be cool" if they fixed the problem that prevents spoiler tags from being opened on mobile browsers. Until then, they hopefully stay disabled.
I hope they come back soon. It sucks having any thread you want to post a lot of images in being stretched to ~600 km
